title: My Application
heroDescription: Connect, learn, and grow. Sign up or log in to access our online courses and bootcamps.
trackingSubtitle: At AprendeYA, we care about your learning journey. Here you can check the real-time status of your course registrations or academic deliveries.
realTimeDesc: Instant status updates on your registration or educational materials
deliverySpeedDesc: 90% of registrations are processed in less than 24 hours
secureDeliveryDesc: Your information is safe and encrypted at all times
commitmentText: Over 10 years connecting people with learning opportunities
qualityText: Our courses are accredited and professionally endorsed
step1: Enter your tracking or registration number
step3: View the status and next steps!
